sub_002_trainer_01:
Hey, new kid! I hear you beat Tulip and earned
yourself a Gym Badge. Nice work!\c
She’s been an overachiever since way back when,
so a defeat now and then’ll help curb her ego![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_02:
I’m gonna kick my training up a gear so I can
beat her in battle just like you did![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_03:
Osu! Want to join me for an ESP session and put
your mind and body to the test?[npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_04: What mode would you like to tackle?[npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_05: And how hard should I make this training session?[npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_06: OK, can do! Let’s take this one niiice ’n’ easy![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_07:
Sounds good! One moderate training sesh,
coming right up![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_08:
Nice! Let’s get that heart pumping with some
vigorous exercise![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_09:
You got it, new kid! Time to kick it up a gear and
go all out![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_10:
This’ll be your first time trying knockout mode,
right? Make even one mistake and the session’s\r
over, so keep that focus razor-sharp![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_11: Your best record so far is...[num2:1] round[s:n1]![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_12:
Put in the work every day and I’m sure you’ll
reach even greater heights! Osu! Let’s get to it![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_13:
Your best record so far is...a jaw-dropping
[num2:1] rounds![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_14:
I’ve got high hopes for you this time, too! Let’s
test the limits of your ESP mastery![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_15:
These training sessions are for challengers who’ve
already beaten the Gym but want to keep\r
enjoying Emotional Spectrum Practice![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_16:
You can train in either standard mode or
knockout mode.[npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_17:
In standard mode, I’ll run you through the ESP
exercise just like in your Gym Test—nice ’n’ easy![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_18:
In knockout mode, you’ll only stop exercising if
you slip up! Who knows how far you’ll go?[npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_19:
Devote yourself to your training, and see if you
can keep beating your personal bests![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_23:
You know what, new kid? I think I can put you
through your paces a little more from now on!\r
I want you to show me what you’re made of![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_22:
Well done on making it all the way through the
nice ’n’ easy training sesh!\c
Here’s your reward for all that hard work![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_27:
You know what, new kid? I think I can put you
through your paces even more from now on!\r
I want you to show me what you’re made of![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_26:
Well done on making it all the way through the
moderate training sesh!\c
Here’s your reward for all that hard work![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_31:
You know what, new kid? I think you’re ready to
handle this exercise at an all-out pace!\c
I want you to aim to be the very best![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_30:
Well done on making it all the way through the
vigorous training sesh!\c
Here’s your reward for all that hard work![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_34:
Well done on making it all the way through the
all-out training sesh!\c
Here’s your reward for all that hard work![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_36:
Oof... Seems you weren’t feeling it this time.
But don’t sweat it! Come train again soon, OK?[npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_37:
You racked up a total of...[num2:1] round[s:n1] this time!
Effort like that’s gotta be rewarded. Here you go![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_39:
You racked up a total of...[num2:1] round[s:n1] this time!
Whoa-ho, that’s a new record! Congrats!\c
Here’s a little something to reward you for your
efforts![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_41:
You racked up an incredible [num2:1] rounds!
I...I didn’t think it could even be done![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_42:
[BD06:0]That was a workout to end all workouts, new kid!
I bet you and [pknm:1] feel great with\r
all\r
those\r
endorphins\r
coursing\r
through you!\c
Here—I gotta give you a prize worthy of such an
achievement![npcn:24]
sub_002_system_44: You received an assortment of[clr:8] Berries[clr:0]!
sub_002_system_46:
You put the assortment of Berries in your Bag’s
[clr:8]Berries[clr:0] pocket.
sub_002_trainer_44:
Once again, you reached a fantastic [num2:1] rounds!
An achievement like that deserves an equally\r
awesome prize—so here you go! Enjoy![npcn:24]
sub_002_trainer_45:
You racked up a total of...[num2:1] round[s:n1] this time!
Hm. I guess your form needs some work...\r
Come back and try again anytime![npcn:24]
